name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zen Tweets - Mute Annoying Twitter Topics

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides tweets about specific topics from your Twitter/x.com timeline using a powerful AI filter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create your peaceful Twitter space by filtering out the noise.

Do you follow someone on X/Twitter, but they start posting about topics you don't care about, like politics, sports, or the usual ragebait?

This extension lets you filter out these types of posts from your timeline using AI. Just choose the topics you donâ€™t want to see, and let the filter work its magic.
